abstract: Sam Roberts Bookshelf column reviews coffee table books New York: The Story of a Great City, edited by Sarah M Henry, BAM: The Complete Works, edited by Steven Sarafin, and High Line: The Inside Story of New York City's Park in the Sky, by Joshua David and Robert Hammond.
snippet: With the holiday season nearing, these coffee table books are made to order for someone who loves New York.
lead_paragraph: With the holiday season nearing, these coffee table books are made to order for someone who loves New York.

headline.main: 400 Years of Artifacts Enrich a Book
headline.print_headline: 400 Years of Artifacts Enrich a Book
headline.seo: ‘New York: The Story of a Great City’ Draws on Museum Archives
